text: Say: "What is most weighty in testimony?" Say: "God: a witness between me and you; and to me is being revealed this Qurâ€™an so that I may warn you thereby, and whomever it may reach." (O you who associate partners with God:) Do you truly testify that there are deities besides God? Say (to them): "I give no such testimony." Say: "He is only One God, and surely I am absolutely free from your association of partners with Him and from whatever you associate with Him as partners
